SETTINGS.MouseGuardMacroShorthandL: Enable a shortened macro syntax which allows referencing attributes directly, for example @str instead of @attributes.str.value. Disable this setting if you need the ability to reference the full attribute model, for example @attributes.str.label.
SETTINGS.MouseGuardInitFormulaL: Enter an initiative formula, such as d20+@dex
MOUSEGUARD.NotifyGroupAttrDuplicate: Attribute group already exists as an attribute.
MOUSEGUARD.NotifyGroupAlphanumeric: Attribute group names may not contain spaces or periods.
MOUSEGUARD.NotifyAttrDuplicate: Attribute key already exists as a group.
MOUSEGUARD.Name: Имя
MOUSEGUARD.FateSub: Потратив 1 балл судьбы, бросьте столько дополнительных кубиков, сколько у вас выпало топоров (AXEICON) при предыдущем броске
MOUSEGUARD.PersonaSub: За 1 балл личности добавьте себе 1 кубик при броске или используйте правило "Привлечь природу"
MOUSEGUARD.BeliefSub: Если ваш персонаж действует в соответствии со своим Убеждением, получите 1 балл судьбы
MOUSEGUARD.InstinctSub: Если ваш персонаж действует в соответствии со своим Инстинктом, получите 1 балл судьбы
MOUSEGUARD.GearTagSub: Gear is limited to what you can carry. Possessions are kept in Lockhaven aor another location
MOUSEGUARD.hungthurstToolTip: Hungry, Thursty: -1 to disposition to any conflict.
MOUSEGUARD.angrySub: -1 to disposition to any conflict that uses Will as its base.
MOUSEGUARD.angryToolTip: Angry: (Ob 2 will) -1 to disposition to any conflict that uses Will as its base.
MOUSEGUARD.tiredToolTip: Tired: (Ob 3 Health) -1 to disposition to any conflict
MOUSEGUARD.injuredSub: -1D to skills, Nature, Will and Health (but not recovery)
MOUSEGUARD.injuredToolTip: Injured: (Ob 4 Health) -1D to skills, Nature, Will and Health (but not recovery)
MOUSEGUARD.sickSub: -1D to skills, Nature, WIll and Health (but not recovery)
MOUSEGUARD.sickToolTip: Sick: (Ob 4 Will) -1D to skills, Nature, WIll and Health (but not recovery)
MOUSEGUARD.TraitBenefitsSub: Уровень 1: +1D один раз в сессию; Уровень 2: +1D дважды в сессию; Уровень 3: Перебросить провал один раз за сессию.
COMBAT.askGoal: Ask Conflict Captain for the Goal
COMBAT.CCSet: A Conflict Captain Has Already Been Set.
COMBAT.NeedCC: A Conflict Captain Must Be Set.
COMBAT.NeedGoal: A Goal must be defined to start a combat. Sending Goal Request to Conflict Captain.
COMBAT.CCERROR: A Conflict Captain may not switch teams.
